text: V/H/S/2 (originally titled S-VHS) is a 2013 horror anthology film produced by Bloody Disgusting. A sequel to V/H/S, it comprises five found-footage segments linked together by a frame narrative. V/H/S/2 features a largely different group of directors: Jason Eisener, Gareth Evans, Timo Tjahjanto, Eduardo Sánchez, and Gregg Hale, and franchise returnees Simon Barrett and Adam Wingard.
